## DropdownPropsBase type

The base props for the [Dropdown()](./dropdown-menu.dropdown.md) component, which are shared between both the internally controlled and externally controlled versions of the component.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type DropdownPropsBase = PropsWithChildren<{
    handle?: ReactRef<DropdownHandle>;
    onOpenMenusChange?: (openMenuIDsPath: string[]) => void;
    closeOnClickOutside?: boolean;
    closeOnClickLeafItem?: boolean;
    mouseHoverEvents?: boolean;
    enableKeyEvents?: boolean;
    pointerEnterExitDelayMS?: number;
}>;
```
**References:** [DropdownHandle](./dropdown-menu.dropdownhandle.md)
